contest-event.event-date: Jan. 25, 1953 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow.
